channel.title: Server updating in
channel.description:
[s]would anyone know how to make a command that starts a timer saying server updating in (then a time)... if so that would be cool... it would be really cool if you could make it recompile and then re run on its own[/s]
I'd like to make a revision i would just like a command that starts the timer and then disconnects everyone... would be a big help thanks!

item.title: Server updating in
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Yeah that command exists
but i have never seen a command that disconnects players,compiles and then runs the server.
but i have seen programs that does stuff like that

Read full topic

item.title: Server updating in
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

There is such a command that exists, but I don’t have any of the sources that have this command, so you’ll have to use the search feature.

edit:

The command I know of will only disconnect everybody upon the timer reaching 0, it won’t do anything else for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Server updating in
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

There is a command that says server updating in…
but i don’t think if there is a command which restarts the server and runs it a gain or whatever

but i think theres a “Server tool” Program. which does that idk.

Read full topic
